Detailed Description

Listener for Banner ads.

Author:
2009-2014 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved

The listener for Banner ads. A listener is set of callback methods that allow a developer to manage and take actions within different phases of ad display.

See also:
Flurry Publisher Support Site for more information

Member Function Documentation

void onAppExit ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when the user is about to be taken outside the app.

This method indicates that an ad has been clicked and the user is about to be taken outside the app.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onClicked ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when an ad is clicked.

This method indicates that an ad has been clicked.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onCloseFullscreen ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when an expanded ad is closed.

This method indicates that an expanded ad has closed.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onError ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner,
FlurryAdErrorType  adErrorType,
int  errorCode 
)

Invoked when an error occurs.

This method indicates that an error has occurred.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
adErrorType The type of error.
errorCode The error code.
void onFetched ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when an ad is fetched.

This method indicates that an ad has been received from the server and stored locally.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onRendered ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when an ad is rendered.

This method indicates that an ad has been rendered.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onShowFullscreen ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when an ad is expanded to fullscreen.

This method indicates that an ad has been expanded to fullscreen.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
void onVideoCompleted ( FlurryAdBanner  adBanner  ) 

Invoked when video viewing has been completed.

This method indicates that video viewing has been completed. The app can check the server for the rewards if this is a rewarded ad space.

Parameters:
adBanner The corresponding banner ad object.
